short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopee's secure network access control extension
short.pt_BR: Extensão de controle de acesso à rede segura da Shopee
short.zh_CN: Shopee 网络安全准入插件

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allow you to access our corp's network, with a secure-by-default settings.
